thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 17 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Zhejiang Jolly Pharmaceutical unit to set up industry buyout fund to invest in biomedicine firm

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Zhejiang Jolly Pharmaceutical unit to set up industry buyout fund to invest in biomedicine firm

organizations.name: reuters) - zhejiang jolly pharmaceutical co ltd

text:
Jan 17(Reuters) - Zhejiang Jolly Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
* Says co’s wholly owned medical unit to set up an industry buyout fund with partner to invest in a Shanghai-based biomedicine firm, with fund’s investment amount of up to 120 million yuan
* Says unit is holding 7.85 percent stake in the Shanghai-based biomedicine firm
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/5coZzb
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
